Basic info about us

The Beauty & Spa Clean Standard™

It is our pleasure to bring the items to your doorstep!
Our mission is to change the way people think about ingredients and products they put on their bodies.
We want to create a safer, more sustainable, more ethical beauty industry.

We call it “Clean Beauty.”

\n
Love Codazon Toys! When I place an order the rep is so friendly and helpful. On a recent order I had to call back and change the address but didn't have it right away. Called back in the morning and The rep was very helpful in changing the address As I put a hold on shipping.
\n
\n
\n
\n
Amanda Robinson
\n
\n
